com.hazelcast.wan

Interface WanReplicationService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CoreService, StatisticsAwareService<LocalWanStats>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WanReplicationServiceImpl

    public interface WanReplicationService
extends CoreService, StatisticsAwareService<LocalWanStats>
    This is the WAN replications service API core interface. The WanReplicationService needs to be capable of creating the actual WanReplicationPublisher instances to replicate values to other clusters over the wide area network, so it has to deal with long delays, slow uploads and higher latencies.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SERVICE_NAME
      Service name.

    • Method Detail

      • getWanReplicationPublisher

        WanReplicationPublisher getWanReplicationPublisher(String name)
        Creates a new WanReplicationPublisher by the given name. If the name already exists, returns the previous instance.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the WAN replication configuration
        Returns:
        instance of the corresponding replication publisher

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Starts the shutdown process of the WAN replication service.

      • pause

        void pause(String wanReplicationName,
           String targetGroupName)
        Pauses WAN replication for the given wanReplicationName and targetGroupName on this hazelcast instance.
        Parameters:
        wanReplicationName - name of WAN replication configuration
        targetGroupName - WAN target cluster group name
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if called on an OS instance

      • stop

        void stop(String wanReplicationName,
          String targetGroupName)
        Stops WAN replication for the given wanReplicationName and targetGroupName on this hazelcast instance.
        Parameters:
        wanReplicationName - name of WAN replication configuration
        targetGroupName - WAN target cluster group name
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if called on an OS instance

      • resume

        void resume(String wanReplicationName,
            String targetGroupName)
        Resumes WAN replication for the given wanReplicationName and targetGroupName on this hazelcast instance.
        Parameters:
        wanReplicationName - name of WAN replication configuration
        targetGroupName - WAN target cluster group name
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if called on an OS instance

      • checkWanReplicationQueues

        void checkWanReplicationQueues(String name)

      • syncMap

        void syncMap(String wanReplicationName,
             String targetGroupName,
             String mapName)
        Initiate wan sync for a specific map. NOTE: not supported on OS, only on EE
        Parameters:
        wanReplicationName - the name of the wan replication config
        targetGroupName - the group name on the target cluster
        mapName - the map name
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported (not EE)
        InvalidConfigurationException - if there is no WAN replication config for wanReplicationName
        SyncFailedException - if there is a anti-entropy request in progress

      • syncAllMaps

        void syncAllMaps(String wanReplicationName,
                 String targetGroupName)
        Initiate wan sync for all maps. NOTE: not supported on OS, only on EE
        Parameters:
        wanReplicationName - the name of the wan replication config
        targetGroupName - the group name on the target cluster
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported (not EE)
        InvalidConfigurationException - if there is no WAN replication config for wanReplicationName
        SyncFailedException - if there is a anti-entropy request in progress

      • consistencyCheck

        void consistencyCheck(String wanReplicationName,
                      String targetGroupName,
                      String mapName)
        Initiate WAN consistency check for a specific map. NOTE: not supported on OS, only on EE
        Parameters:
        wanReplicationName - the name of the wan replication config
        targetGroupName - the group name on the target cluster
        mapName - the map name
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported (not EE)
        InvalidConfigurationException - if there is no WAN replication config for wanReplicationName
        SyncFailedException - if there is a anti-entropy request in progress

        targetGroupName - the target cluster group name
